import React, { Component } from 'react' import './../index.css' import { Container, Header, Button, Icon, Grid, Menu, Segment,Image,Divider, } from 'semantic-ui-react' import { right } from '@popperjs/core' export default class About extends Component { state = { activeItem: 'home' } handleItemClick = (e, { name }) => this.setState({ activeItem: name }) render() { const { activeItem } = this.state return (

We Help Companies and Companions

We can give your company superpowers to do things that they never thought possible. Let us delight your customers and empower your needs... through pure data analytics.

We Make Bananas That Can Dance

Yes that's right, you thought it was the stuff of dreams, but even bananas can be bioengineered.
